messages.message: For the hackathon, I would like us to try something that addresses a lot of the usability gripes I have with Grafana - push the envelope! As @Kerry has said many times, let's not let on-prem hold us back from exploring the best solutions for our Saas offerings. We don't have to offer the same thing for on-prem, we just need to communicate the gap or an alternative solution. In this case, since the ease of debugging is mainly for our eng team, it wouldn't really apply for on-prem anyways (since we don't have access to debugging tools on-prem).
The usability of Grafana isn't just for frontend debugging - right now my feedback is on our backend debugging!
also +1 on scaling up our observability db. I get timeouts quite frequently, or queries run really slowly.

i think @abhitaker’s main concern was that third-party solutions are much more expensive than open-source tools like Grafana, especially if we use these tools across multiple SaaS environments

i also think that there are probably more plugins / custom dashboards we can set up on Grafana to improve usability, but they’re more difficult to configure and maintain, compared to something like Sentry
if we have time, maybe we can try all options for frontend observability and compare/contrast :stuck_out_tongue:
